description: Bundled to help the conservation of solitary bees and other pollinators, contains; The Bee Barn Natural Nesting Hay A pack of nectar-rich Wildflower Seeds Our latest Conservation Guide on Bees Lovingly packed in our Gift Box Firstly, For the love of Bees gift pack contains a charming, customer favourite ‘Bee Barn’. Produced from sustainably managed, wood, with a recycled second-life plastic frontage. Designed to attract, solitary bees and other species of pollinators and insects. The barn also offers shelter and a space to create homes for these creatures in the various sections. This Bee Barn comes in an attractive gift box and is easy to put up and maintain. Many other pollinators may nest in the bee barn, but they will require some nesting material. Nesting material can fit in the lower compartment. As they often like to adopt ready-made nests from other creatures, such as birds. Secondly, the bundle also contains natural nesting hay for the ‘Bee Barn’. As well as a pack of seeds to grow colourful nectar-rich wildflowers that attract and feed bees. Plus, our latest conservation guide on Bees. This Gift Bundle is the perfect gift for your nature-loving friends and family. You’ll be helping them create a cosy home for solitary bees in their gardens and outdoor spaces. Therefore, continuing the much-needed conservation of our friendly pollinators!

Use the real-working drill to build your own race car and add the Race Car Driver Buddy to the driver’s seat for a thrilling drilling race to the finish line. Pull into the pit stop and get drilling. Plus, the box converts into a reusable playset! Turn it inside out for your own racetrack stadium. This race car construction set is ideal for pre-schoolers fascinated with racing and construction. Snap on the wheels and attach the bolts using the power drill, just like real racing pit crew. Pop the Driver Buddy in the driving seat with his Pit Crew Buddy, Monkey Wrench, behind him and off they go. Driver Buddy has changeable facial expressions. title: Planetarium Projector
Planetarium Projector: Create a Space Theatre with Authentic Star Maps & Cosmic Images, Features 2 Projections & Auto-Off Timer for Fun Family Nights
description:
Turn your bedroom into your very own planetarium theatre! 

 Light up your room with  projections of the stars and space-themed images across the ceiling and walls. This home planetarium is actually two projectors in one. The first is a rotating star map dome that projects astronomically accurate maps of the stars.

 The second projects space-related images, including all eight planets, eight human-made space objects like rockets and satellites, and eight extragalactic phenomena like nebula and galaxies. 

 Use nightlight mode to automatically shut off the projector after 15, 30, or 60 minutes. The compact, space-saving design can be placed on a flat surface or hung on a wall. Includes colour educational poster and instruction sheet.


 Includes:

  
 *  2-in-1 planetarium projector  
 * Rotating star map dome; northern and southern hemispheres 
 * Long-lasting LED lights 
 * Nightlight mode and auto-off timer 
 * Focusable lenses  
 * Storage compartment for image disks   
 * 4 image disks with 8 space-related images each; 32 images in total

Cosmic Creator Planetarium Projector Turn Your Room into an Interstellar Adventure Get ready for an out-of-this-world experience right in your own home with the Thames and Kosmos Planetarium Projector. This fantastic gadget transforms any room into your personal cosmos, perfect for sparking wonder and imagination in every member of the family. Imagine drifting off to sleep under a canopy of twinkling stars, each one precisely mapped to the northern and southern hemispheres, creating an astronomically accurate celestial display. But that's just the beginning of the magic! This isn't just one projector, it's two brilliant projectors working together to bring the universe to you. The first projector offers that captivating rotating star map, immersing you in the vastness of space. The second projector is your gateway to a dazzling array of space-themed images, showcasing all eight planets in our solar system, impressive human-made marvels like mighty rockets and intricate satellites soaring through the void, and breathtaking extragalactic wonders such as vibrant nebulae and majestic galaxies. With focusable lenses, you can adjust the clarity of these cosmic visions to be perfectly crisp and clear. Want to keep the wonder going without staying up all night? The ingenious nightlight mode allows you to set an auto-off timer for 15, 30, or 60 minutes, gently lulling you or your little astronauts to sleep. This projector boasts long-lasting LED lights that provide brilliant illumination without excessive heat. It's designed with your space in mind too, featuring a compact and space-saving design that can easily sit on any flat surface or even be conveniently hung on a wall. Included in the box is a colourful educational poster, a handy instruction sheet to guide your celestial exploration, and an incredible collection of 4 image disks, each containing 8 spectacular space-related images, bringing your total cosmic image count to a whopping 32! You'll also discover a clever storage compartment built right into the projector for keeping your image disks organized and ready for your next adventure. This projector also offers dynamic color settings for a truly immersive experience. The built-in speaker allows you to play your favorite space-themed music or narration for an even more engaging show, enhancing the educational and entertainment value of this amazing device. Discover the wonders of the universe with this all-in-one cosmic projector that promises endless fun and learning for the whole family.

description:
Learning Resources 1-2-3 Build It! Robot Factory.

 What kind of robots can you dream up? Kids build their own twisting, turning STEM creations with the mix-and-match pieces of the 1-2-3 Build It! Robot Factory from Learning Resources.

 Sized just right for little hands, this build-it-yourself toy's chunky plastic pieces are ready to help kids design, build, and tinker with their own robot squad during open-ended play sessions.

 Build tall bots with squiggly green legs, add a few eyes to help your creation see, or snap on a propeller that really spins!

 1-2-3 Build It! Robot Factory also comes with an Activity Guide featuring recommended builds, which helps kids learn essential STEM skills ranging from critical thinking and early engineering to following directions!

title: Planetarium Projector
Planetarium Projector: Create a Space Theatre with Authentic Star Maps & Cosmic Images, Features 2 Projections & Auto-Off Timer for Fun Family Nights
description:
Turn your bedroom into your very own planetarium theatre! 

 Light up your room with  projections of the stars and space-themed images across the ceiling and walls. This home planetarium is actually two projectors in one. The first is a rotating star map dome that projects astronomically accurate maps of the stars.

 The second projects space-related images, including all eight planets, eight human-made space objects like rockets and satellites, and eight extragalactic phenomena like nebula and galaxies. 

 Use nightlight mode to automatically shut off the projector after 15, 30, or 60 minutes. The compact, space-saving design can be placed on a flat surface or hung on a wall. Includes colour educational poster and instruction sheet.


 Includes:

  
 *  2-in-1 planetarium projector  
 * Rotating star map dome; northern and southern hemispheres 
 * Long-lasting LED lights 
 * Nightlight mode and auto-off timer 
 * Focusable lenses  
 * Storage compartment for image disks   
 * 4 image disks with 8 space-related images each; 32 images in total

Cosmic Creator Planetarium Projector Turn Your Room into an Interstellar Adventure Get ready for an out-of-this-world experience right in your own home with the Thames and Kosmos Planetarium Projector. This fantastic gadget transforms any room into your personal cosmos, perfect for sparking wonder and imagination in every member of the family. Imagine drifting off to sleep under a canopy of twinkling stars, each one precisely mapped to the northern and southern hemispheres, creating an astronomically accurate celestial display. But that's just the beginning of the magic! This isn't just one projector, it's two brilliant projectors working together to bring the universe to you. The first projector offers that captivating rotating star map, immersing you in the vastness of space. The second projector is your gateway to a dazzling array of space-themed images, showcasing all eight planets in our solar system, impressive human-made marvels like mighty rockets and intricate satellites soaring through the void, and breathtaking extragalactic wonders such as vibrant nebulae and majestic galaxies. With focusable lenses, you can adjust the clarity of these cosmic visions to be perfectly crisp and clear. Want to keep the wonder going without staying up all night? The ingenious nightlight mode allows you to set an auto-off timer for 15, 30, or 60 minutes, gently lulling you or your little astronauts to sleep. This projector boasts long-lasting LED lights that provide brilliant illumination without excessive heat. It's designed with your space in mind too, featuring a compact and space-saving design that can easily sit on any flat surface or even be conveniently hung on a wall. Included in the box is a colourful educational poster, a handy instruction sheet to guide your celestial exploration, and an incredible collection of 4 image disks, each containing 8 spectacular space-related images, bringing your total cosmic image count to a whopping 32! You'll also discover a clever storage compartment built right into the projector for keeping your image disks organized and ready for your next adventure. This projector also offers dynamic color settings for a truly immersive experience. The built-in speaker allows you to play your favorite space-themed music or narration for an even more engaging show, enhancing the educational and entertainment value of this amazing device. Discover the wonders of the universe with this all-in-one cosmic projector that promises endless fun and learning for the whole family.

description: Bundled to help the conservation of solitary bees and other pollinators, contains; The Bee Barn Natural Nesting Hay A pack of nectar-rich Wildflower Seeds Our latest Conservation Guide on Bees Lovingly packed in our Gift Box Firstly, For the love of Bees gift pack contains a charming, customer favourite ‘Bee Barn’. Produced from sustainably managed, wood, with a recycled second-life plastic frontage. Designed to attract, solitary bees and other species of pollinators and insects. The barn also offers shelter and a space to create homes for these creatures in the various sections. This Bee Barn comes in an attractive gift box and is easy to put up and maintain. Many other pollinators may nest in the bee barn, but they will require some nesting material. Nesting material can fit in the lower compartment. As they often like to adopt ready-made nests from other creatures, such as birds. Secondly, the bundle also contains natural nesting hay for the ‘Bee Barn’. As well as a pack of seeds to grow colourful nectar-rich wildflowers that attract and feed bees. Plus, our latest conservation guide on Bees. This Gift Bundle is the perfect gift for your nature-loving friends and family. You’ll be helping them create a cosy home for solitary bees in their gardens and outdoor spaces. Therefore, continuing the much-needed conservation of our friendly pollinators!

Plus, the box converts into a reusable playset! Turn it inside out for your own racetrack stadium. This race car construction set is ideal for pre-schoolers fascinated with racing and construction. Snap on the wheels and attach the bolts using the power drill, just like real racing pit crew. Pop the Driver Buddy in the driving seat with his Pit Crew Buddy, Monkey Wrench, behind him and off they go. Driver Buddy has changeable facial expressions. Ideal for practising fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination through play. Includes seven snap together race car toy parts, nine bolts, Race Car Driver Buddy with changeable expressions, Monkey Wrench the Pit Crew Buddy, and power drill. Keep the box! Each Bolt Buddies package unfolds to become a unique reusable playset for even more imaginative play fun. Modern chunky design makes the drill easy for little hands to grip and use. The toy power drill works just like a real one – you can even change the drill direction and see the gears turn. Race Car measures 20cm L x 9cm H. Includes multilingual guide. Drill design is U.S. patented. Drill requires 2 AA batteries (not included). Ages 3 - 7.

title: Planetarium Projector
Planetarium Projector: Create a Space Theatre with Authentic Star Maps & Cosmic Images, Features 2 Projections & Auto-Off Timer for Fun Family Nights
description:
Turn your bedroom into your very own planetarium theatre! 

 Light up your room with  projections of the stars and space-themed images across the ceiling and walls. This home planetarium is actually two projectors in one. The first is a rotating star map dome that projects astronomically accurate maps of the stars.

 The second projects space-related images, including all eight planets, eight human-made space objects like rockets and satellites, and eight extragalactic phenomena like nebula and galaxies. 

 Use nightlight mode to automatically shut off the projector after 15, 30, or 60 minutes. The compact, space-saving design can be placed on a flat surface or hung on a wall. Includes colour educational poster and instruction sheet.


 Includes:

  
 *  2-in-1 planetarium projector  
 * Rotating star map dome; northern and southern hemispheres 
 * Long-lasting LED lights 
 * Nightlight mode and auto-off timer 
 * Focusable lenses  
 * Storage compartment for image disks   
 * 4 image disks with 8 space-related images each; 32 images in total

Cosmic Creator Planetarium Projector Turn Your Room into an Interstellar Adventure Get ready for an out-of-this-world experience right in your own home with the Thames and Kosmos Planetarium Projector. This fantastic gadget transforms any room into your personal cosmos, perfect for sparking wonder and imagination in every member of the family. Imagine drifting off to sleep under a canopy of twinkling stars, each one precisely mapped to the northern and southern hemispheres, creating an astronomically accurate celestial display. But that's just the beginning of the magic! This isn't just one projector, it's two brilliant projectors working together to bring the universe to you. The first projector offers that captivating rotating star map, immersing you in the vastness of space. The second projector is your gateway to a dazzling array of space-themed images, showcasing all eight planets in our solar system, impressive human-made marvels like mighty rockets and intricate satellites soaring through the void, and breathtaking extragalactic wonders such as vibrant nebulae and majestic galaxies. With focusable lenses, you can adjust the clarity of these cosmic visions to be perfectly crisp and clear. Want to keep the wonder going without staying up all night? The ingenious nightlight mode allows you to set an auto-off timer for 15, 30, or 60 minutes, gently lulling you or your little astronauts to sleep. This projector boasts long-lasting LED lights that provide brilliant illumination without excessive heat. It's designed with your space in mind too, featuring a compact and space-saving design that can easily sit on any flat surface or even be conveniently hung on a wall. Included in the box is a colourful educational poster, a handy instruction sheet to guide your celestial exploration, and an incredible collection of 4 image disks, each containing 8 spectacular space-related images, bringing your total cosmic image count to a whopping 32! You'll also discover a clever storage compartment built right into the projector for keeping your image disks organized and ready for your next adventure. This projector also offers dynamic color settings for a truly immersive experience. The built-in speaker allows you to play your favorite space-themed music or narration for an even more engaging show, enhancing the educational and entertainment value of this amazing device. Discover the wonders of the universe with this all-in-one cosmic projector that promises endless fun and learning for the whole family.

title: Planetarium Projector
Planetarium Projector: Create a Space Theatre with Authentic Star Maps & Cosmic Images, Features 2 Projections & Auto-Off Timer for Fun Family Nights
description:
Turn your bedroom into your very own planetarium theatre! 

 Light up your room with  projections of the stars and space-themed images across the ceiling and walls. This home planetarium is actually two projectors in one. The first is a rotating star map dome that projects astronomically accurate maps of the stars.

 The second projects space-related images, including all eight planets, eight human-made space objects like rockets and satellites, and eight extragalactic phenomena like nebula and galaxies. 

 Use nightlight mode to automatically shut off the projector after 15, 30, or 60 minutes. The compact, space-saving design can be placed on a flat surface or hung on a wall. Includes colour educational poster and instruction sheet.


 Includes:

  
 *  2-in-1 planetarium projector  
 * Rotating star map dome; northern and southern hemispheres 
 * Long-lasting LED lights 
 * Nightlight mode and auto-off timer 
 * Focusable lenses  
 * Storage compartment for image disks   
 * 4 image disks with 8 space-related images each; 32 images in total

Cosmic Creator Planetarium Projector Turn Your Room into an Interstellar Adventure Get ready for an out-of-this-world experience right in your own home with the Thames and Kosmos Planetarium Projector. This fantastic gadget transforms any room into your personal cosmos, perfect for sparking wonder and imagination in every member of the family. Imagine drifting off to sleep under a canopy of twinkling stars, each one precisely mapped to the northern and southern hemispheres, creating an astronomically accurate celestial display. But that's just the beginning of the magic! This isn't just one projector, it's two brilliant projectors working together to bring the universe to you. The first projector offers that captivating rotating star map, immersing you in the vastness of space. The second projector is your gateway to a dazzling array of space-themed images, showcasing all eight planets in our solar system, impressive human-made marvels like mighty rockets and intricate satellites soaring through the void, and breathtaking extragalactic wonders such as vibrant nebulae and majestic galaxies. With focusable lenses, you can adjust the clarity of these cosmic visions to be perfectly crisp and clear. Want to keep the wonder going without staying up all night? The ingenious nightlight mode allows you to set an auto-off timer for 15, 30, or 60 minutes, gently lulling you or your little astronauts to sleep. This projector boasts long-lasting LED lights that provide brilliant illumination without excessive heat. It's designed with your space in mind too, featuring a compact and space-saving design that can easily sit on any flat surface or even be conveniently hung on a wall. Included in the box is a colourful educational poster, a handy instruction sheet to guide your celestial exploration, and an incredible collection of 4 image disks, each containing 8 spectacular space-related images, bringing your total cosmic image count to a whopping 32! You'll also discover a clever storage compartment built right into the projector for keeping your image disks organized and ready for your next adventure. This projector also offers dynamic color settings for a truly immersive experience. The built-in speaker allows you to play your favorite space-themed music or narration for an even more engaging show, enhancing the educational and entertainment value of this amazing device. Discover the wonders of the universe with this all-in-one cosmic projector that promises endless fun and learning for the whole family.
